 Description:

 Wolfenstein: The New Order - is a revival of the series, which once marked the beginning of the genre of FPS. Developed studio Machine Games, which gathered experienced craftsmen who created not one famous game , Wolfenstein is a combination of a psychological drama with a gripping storyline , adventure and combat system in the first person . In a tense , cinematic and graphically very reliable (due to engine id Tech Ã‚Â® 5 engine from id Ã‚Â® Software's) game Wolfenstein hero must destroy the Nazi war machine , to conquer all of Europe. Using a small handful of survivors of the Resistance fighters you have to infiltrate the most sensitive sites Reich to fight the fascist legions fighting robots , take control of a super - weapon, subdued the whole earth ... and not only. Mastering the hitherto unknown Supertehnologiya , Nazi Germany was able to turn the tide of war and brought to its knees , even the most powerful nations . War hero BJ Blaskowitz spent 14 years in a coma , and awoke to find that the yard in 1960 , World War II played , and the Nazis rule the world with an iron fist . You will become Blaskowitz - the hero of a lost war and the only person in the world , capable of changing the course of history .
